document.docAuthor: Ledesma, Enrique, Jiménez-Valverde, Alberto, Salgado, José María & Ortuño, Vicente M.
document.masterDocTitle: Cholevinae (Coleoptera: Leiodidae) of the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park, Spain: occurrence in the MSS of a siliceous landscape

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Cholevinae (Coleoptera: Leiodidae) of the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park, Spain: occurrence in the MSS of a siliceous landscape

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Research Team on Soil Biology and Subterranean Ecosystems, Department of Life Science, Faculty of Science, University of Alcalá, Alcalá de Henares, Madrid (Spain)
Research Team on Soil Biology and Subterranean Ecosystems, Department of Life Science, Faculty of Science, University of Alcalá, Alcalá de Henares, Madrid (Spain)
Department of Ecology and Animal Biology, Campus As Lagoas - Marcosende, University of Vigo, Vigo (Spain)
Research Team on Soil Biology and Subterranean Ecosystems, Department of Life Science, Faculty of Science, University of Alcalá, Alcalá de Henares, Madrid (Spain)

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE LOCALITY
. — Germany : Saxony , Dresden ( Panzer 1794 ).

DISTRIBUTION. — (EURP) Species widely distributed in Europe, and North Africa, also present in Afghanistan . The distribution in the Iberian Peninsula is wide, although the species is unknown from the western part.

Spain
